newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian shares active, Unibanka up slightly.
newsitem.headline: Latvian shares active, Unibanka up slightly.

text.p: Latvian shares saw active trade of more than 100,000 lats on Tuesday, with leading bank Unibanka drifting slightly higher, the stock exchange said.
Overall turnover was 103,222 lats and Unibanka rose to 2.15 lats from 2.12 lats on trade of 46,949 lats.
The other official list share, Riga Transport Fleet, climbed to 1.07 lats from 1.04 lats on turnover of 17,844 lats.
On the secondary list, the Daugavpils machine factory saw high turnover of 19,212 lats and added 10 santimes to 82.
The Kaija fish cannery was the next most active on 12,622 lats and leaped to 1.23 lats from 1.07.
But there were some fallers as the Riga yeast factory slipped 14.63 percent to 1.40 lats on trade of 3,505 lats.
